name: Star Platinum vs The World Demo
name_original: Star Platinum vs The World Demo
description:
It's the fight of the century, Jotaro's Star Platinum vs Dio's The World! In this test project, fists exponentially spawn to create the illusion of a barrage of punches. Sound effects and background music included.

-----Controls------

Space Bar: Spawns a few fists

'A' Key: Spawns many fists! Be carefully, this causes slow down.
